channel.title: Lo-Fi Python - coding, programming, python, stocks, CLI

item.title: Making a Yahoo Stock Price Summary CLI with Python
item.description: Over the past few years, I found a few different external Python libraries that relied on a broken Yahoo Finance API. Apparently, the API changes frequently, leaving us developers in a tough spot troubleshooting tracebacks in order to get stock data. I wanted to check my stocks' prices from the â€¦
item.dc:creator: lofipython
